name: Nusrat Jahan
bio: With over 15 years of experience in nonprofit leadership, Nusrat founded WarmHope in 2010 to address winter clothing shortages in vulnerable communities. She holds an MBA in Social Enterprise.

name: Kamal Ahmed
bio: Kamal oversees our distribution network across 5 regions, ensuring efficient delivery of winter essentials. Formerly with Red Cross, he brings 8 years of logistics expertise.

name: Tasnim Rahman
bio: CPA-certified financial professional managing our $2M annual budget. Tasnim implements rigorous accountability measures while maximizing donor impact.

name: Arif Khan
bio: Leads our 50+ field staff and volunteers in direct community outreach. Arif's grassroots experience helps us identify areas of greatest need each winter season.

name: Sayed Islam
bio: Manages our 300+ volunteer network. Sadia developed our acclaimed training program that prepares volunteers for winter distribution challenges.

name: Rezaul Karim
bio: Oversees our donor management systems and developed the WarmHope mobile app for real-time inventory tracking. Former tech startup CTO with a passion for social impact.
